quiz.question: Which restaurant promoted "Have it your way" as its slogan?

Which Mexican chain used the tagline "Think outside the bun" before adopting other slogans?
Which sandwich chain stressed fast delivery with the tagline "Freaky Fast"?
Which fast food restaurant uses the slogan "I'm lovin' it"?
Which chain used the slogan "Good Mood Food" to brand its menu?
Which chicken chain used the phrase "Love That Chicken From Popeyes" in ads?
Which fast food chain uses the cow-written slogan "Eat Mor Chikin"?
Which coffee chain used the motto "To inspire and nurture the human spirit" as its mission?
Which burger brand introduced the global jingle "I'm lovin' it" in a wide campaign?
Which West Coast burger chain uses "Quality You Can Taste"?

Which burger chain touts "Fresh, Never Frozen" beef as a key differentiator?
